thread.title: The only hotel in the city we will stay at..
thread.title_full: The only hotel in the city we will stay at.. - Review of Hotel 32 32, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Frank C
title: The only hotel in the city we will stay at..
text: This is our fourth time staying here at hotel 3232 and all I can say OUTSTANDING!!! Cleanest rooms. Great decor. And with out a doubt. The most friendliest staff!!!! Thank you Jason....Mike...and the rest of the gang here at Hotel 32 32.
